import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Award achievement to user"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/{UserId}/achievements/award/{AchievementId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Awards a specific achievement to a user. This is typically used by administrators or automated systems to recognize accomplishments and milestones.

**Prerequisites**
1. **UserId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) to locate the user. Extract `Items[].UserId`.
2. **AchievementId** - Obtain from your achievements catalog or from [GET /api/v1.0/users/\{UserId\}/achievements](/docs/api/users/get-user-achievements) if re-awarding an existing achievement.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for the user: [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) â†’ extract UserId.
2. Identify the achievement to award (AchievementId).
3. POST this endpoint with UserId and AchievementId.

**Minimal Required Fields**: UserId, AchievementId (path parameters)

**Notes**: Typically restricted to admin roles or automated services. Duplicate awards may be ignored depending on server rules.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"UserId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the user to award Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users), extract `Items[].UserId`.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/users","responseField":"Items[].UserId"}}},{"name":"AchievementId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the achievement to award","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
